channel.title: events on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in events on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: events
item.description: future conferences 18th Conference of the International Federation and Classification Societies (July 15-17, 2024 - San Jose, Costarica) 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 17-20, 2024 - Bari, Italy) 12th VOC conference (March 08, 2024 - Nijmegen, The Netherlands) recent events Workshop on Statistical Computing and Robust Inference for High Dimensional Data (December 10-14, 2023 - Taipei, Taiwan) ISI 2023: 64th ISI World Statistics Congress (July 16-20, 2023 - Ottawa, Canada) DSSV-ECDA 2023: Joint conference of Data Science, Statistics & Visualisation and the European Conference on Data Analysis (July 05-07, 2023 - Antwerp, Belgium) SIS 2023: 52nd Scientific Meeting of the Italian Statistical Society (June 21-23, 2023 - Ancona, Italy)

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects software seminars and talks events teaching
